ryAg8LwHLc0.content:
# Notes

* To draw a new circle, send a pulse to the UPD pin of the draw-circle node.
* To blank the screen, send a pulse to the UPD pin of the fill-screen node.

@/01-example.description: Draw a circle and then edit its appearance using the tweak nodes. Run in debugger.

S1XdlkC5PC.description: Make the node respond to changes in the input to ON.
S1XdlkC5PC.label: ACT

BkDTpZaqwC.description: True to fill circle with colour, False to draw outline only.
BkDTpZaqwC.label: Fill

Hkd_W8a5wR.description: True to fill ellipse with colour, False to draw outline only.
Hkd_W8a5wR.label: Fill

rk4GZwT5wA.description: X coordinate of the start of the line.
rk4GZwT5wA.label: X

S1rf-DT9DC.description: Y coordinate of the start of the line.
S1rf-DT9DC.label: Y

Bk4WPPTcwC.description: X coordinate of the start of the line.
Bk4WPPTcwC.label: X0

S1r-Dvp9DR.description: Y coordinate of the start of the line.
S1r-Dvp9DR.label: Y0

HJ8-PwTqvA.description: X coordinate of the end of the line.
HJ8-PwTqvA.label: X1

H1vZvwacvC.description: Y coordinate of the end of the line.
H1vZvwacvC.label: Y1

SJNVUta9vR.description: X coordinate of the top-left corner.
SJNVUta9vR.label: X

ByH48Fp9wA.description: Y coordinate of the top-left corner.
ByH48Fp9wA.label: Y

HyuN8YT9v0.description: True to fill rectangle with colour, False to draw outline only.
HyuN8YT9v0.label: Fill

ByE86jpcvR.description: X coordinate of the top-left corner.
ByE86jpcvR.label: X

Skr8Tjp9wR.description: Y coordinate of the top-left corner.
Skr8Tjp9wR.label: Y

Sk_U6j65vA.description: True to fill rectangle with colour, False to draw outline only.
Sk_U6j65vA.label: Fill

BJwz32a5DC.description: Text size multiplier (takes values from 01h to 07h).
BJwz32a5DC.label: Size

SJ-esm6sA.label: Font
SJ-esm6sA.description: Font. Choose one of the fonts in wayland/sensecap-indicator-gfx-fonts. If no font is specified the node will default to GLCD.

BJ5jS3T5PA.description: True to fill triangle with colour, False to draw outline only.
BJ5jS3T5PA.label: Fill

ryNIbupqwA.description: X coordinate of the start of the line.
ryNIbupqwA.label: X

r1BIbdTcDC.description: Y coordinate of the start of the line.
r1BIbdTcDC.label: Y

ByQ2wlRqwC.description: Rotation. Options: 00h (0), 01h (90), 02h (180) and 03h (270). N.B. the lcd-device node sets the rotation to 03h (270) as this is the most commonly used orientation.
ByQ2wlRqwC.label: Rotate

@/02-example.description: Demonstration of some of the shapes and patterns that can be drawn on the LCD. Use button to advance through the examples.

description: Graphics library for the Sense CAP Indicator screen. Wraps https://github.com/WaylandM/Seeed_Arduino_GFX
name: sensecap-indicator-gfx
